name: Event Card Details View (via "View Details" link)
description:
This view shows more details about the a users specific check in. Additional content includes:
*full score view or title view (NGE)
*user inputted Notes, including Section Row Seat
*user added photos in a larger size
*add photos button
*game wrap button if available
*delete check-in button

name: Event Card - Add and Delete Photo Functionality
description: Add a photo in the main view with a floating or static button. After selecting a photo, a full screen view pops up with the option to delete. Pinch to zoom also available on iOS.

name: Event Card - Editing Check-Ins Text
description: In the top right corner of the Detials view there is now an "Edit" button. A edit view appears giving the user the ability to edit their Section, Row, Seat, and User Message.

name: Event Card - Deleting A Check-In
description: At the very bottom of the table view in the details view, there will be a delete button.
